sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Your cancellation could not be processed

sys_variable_value.value: Your cancellation could not be processed

sys_element_mapping.value:
HelloTrigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Client Name

Your cancellation cannot  be processed due to one or more reasons. If your booking is for a non- refundable room, please note that booking cannot be cancelled as per the terms and conditions.

If the cancellation period is expired, you may be eligible for a partial refund. Please check your confirmation email for details.

Hello Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Client Name

We have cancelled your booking as per your request. Please allow 48 hours for payment to be refunded to the original payment method.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Confirm payment and check what is allowable as per terms and condition

sys_variable_value.value: short_description=Confirm payment and check what is allowable as per terms and condition
Reject if cancellation is on non-refundable rooms or past cancellation period
